author: nataliaratnikova
body:
Bug-fix release DMWMMON-datasvc-v.1.0.3 .
- Resolves issues: 
  https://github.com/dmwm/DMWMMON/issues/19
  https://github.com/dmwm/DMWMMON/issues/21
- Removed many unused source files
- The  spec file in cmsdist now provides inclusive list of contents. 
- Modified files in this release:
  PhEDExWeb/DataService/ChangeLog
  PhEDExWeb/DataService/conf/datasvc-app.conf
  perl_lib/PHEDEX/RequestAllocator/Core.pm
  perl_lib/PHEDEX/Web/API/StorageUsage.pm
  perl_lib/PHEDEX/Core/Agent/DB.pm
title: Changes for HG1510: bug-fix release DMWMMON-datasvc-v.1.0.3.
